place_description:
Nestled in the heart of the community, Passion’s Café & Pastry is a cozy haven where locals and visitors alike come together to enjoy freshly brewed coffee and delectable pastries. Our café is all about crafting experiences — from the moment you step inside, you’ll be greeted by the warm aroma of our artisan coffee blends and the sweet scents of freshly baked pastries, all made with the finest ingredients.

Whether you’re here to relax with a favorite book, catch up with friends, or work in a welcoming space, Passion’s Café & Pastry is designed to make you feel right at home. Our friendly team is passionate about delivering the perfect cup and treat to brighten your day. We offer a variety of pastries, from buttery croissants to decadent ca

reviews_data.review_text: Got a sausage egg and cheese on a cheddar bagel and it was excellent.
I tried the new pizza bagel! it was delicious. They put it on a homemade cheddar bagel and that was really good.
I tried the fresh bagel and homemade strawberry cream cheese! It was delicious and the owner was nice and informative.

I got a latte and a sausage, egg, cheese on a sesame bagel. The food was okay. There was only one person working, taking orders and doing the cooking so service was very slow.   There are these horrible flickering fluorescent lights. I would suggest swapping them out, it would make a huge difference. Also more art, plants, and some comfy chairs would give this place an older and more established feel. Adding darker colors would help with the ambiance too. Lastly, I didn't receive a coffee cup sleeve and since my coffee was hot I couldn't pick it up and sip it while my order was being made. This is clearly a new business, probably owner operated, I think there is great potential but definitely some improvements needed.

This was my first time in, and I'll definitely go back. The vanilla latte was delicious but could have been hotter. The young lady that made my latte was very sweet. However, the customer service was lacking a bit. I would love to have known more about the business and their offerings, but there wasn't much interaction with the employees. The French toast muffin is incredible! It's not too sweet and tasted just like French toast. I would appreciate napkins being out for customers and maybe not use so much bleach when cleaning the floors. I wanted to dine in, but the smell was too strong. I think this place could definitely be a staple in the community.
The ladies in there are so nice and friendly, oh and my breakfast sandwich was a 10 out of 10!! Check them out. You won't be disappointed
Great coffee! Definitely try their breakfast sandwiches and their Philly cheese steaks!

Perfect Spot for Coffee and Conversation

I recently visited this cafe, and it exceeded all my expectations! From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm and inviting, with just the right blend of modern decor and cozy charm. The cleanliness was impeccable, every corner of the space was spotless, which added to the overall comfort of the experience.

The staff were professional, friendly, and attentive without being overbearing. They made me feel welcome and were happy to answer my questions about the menu. The coffee was outstanding--rich, flavorful, and perfectly brewed and paired beautifully with the freshly made pastries and light bites. I also had the Philly and chicken cheese sandwiches and they were delicious with perfect serving sizes. Can't beat the pricing!

It's clear this cafe values its customers and takes pride in its service. Whether you're looking for a place to relax, work, or catch up with friends, this is the perfect spot. I'll definitely be back soon! Highly recommended.
I absolutely love the place! Coffee, amazing muffin amazing customer service A+

Homemade cakes, muffins, pastries!
Great coffees and teas!
Also serve breakfast sandwiches, lunch salads and subs!
Must try!
Stopped by for lunch and ordered the salad. I was happy to find out the menu price included 5 toppings. Paired it with a sweet tea. I will go back again
